analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/35/0xc7f499a918a09087ba90582d7c1239b4578f0101.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/35/0xc7f499a918a09087ba90582d7c1239b4578f0101.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/35/0xc7f499a918a09087ba90582d7c1239b4578f0101.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of PPUToken.isAccountLocked (/unique_chucks/35/0xc7f499a918a09087ba90582d7c1239b4578f0101.sol#251) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of PPUToken.isAccountLocked (/unique_chucks/35/0xc7f499a918a09087ba90582d7c1239b4578f0101.sol#251-253) is not in mixedCase
